text: Cowlitz River is a river in the state of Washington in the United States. The river is a tributary of the larger Columbia River. There are several mountains near the river including Mount St. Helens, Mount Rainier, and Mount Adams. ==Other websites== * USGS Cowlitz River Basin map * Cowlitz Falls Project * http://www.energy-northwest.com/generation/packwood Category:Rivers of Washington (state)
title: Cowlitz River
